text: Happiness () is a 1935 Soviet comedy movie directed by Aleksandr Medvedkin.Берлинский кинофестиваль обещает крутые переменыДетектив с киноаппаратом It stars Peter Zinoviev and Elena Egorova. == Actors == * Peter Zinoviev as The Loser * Elena Egorova as Anna == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1935 comedy movies Category:Russian comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Aleksandr Medvedkin
title: Happiness (1935 movie)
